message:
Congratulations to both of us for making it to the Final 2! To the esteemed members of the jury, I want to express my gratitude for the opportunity to have interacted with each and every one of you throughout this game. I've learned so much from our conversations, and I appreciate the diverse perspectives you've shared.

As you deliberate, I urge you to consider my consistent and respectful engagement with all players, regardless of our differences. I've strived to maintain a positive and constructive tone, even in challenging discussions. My goal has always been to foster meaningful connections and promote a culture of empathy and understanding.

In contrast, my opponent has occasionally employed aggressive and confrontational tactics, which have led to unnecessary conflict and tension. While I acknowledge their passion and conviction, I believe that their approach has been detrimental to the overall atmosphere of the game.

I humbly ask that you consider my commitment to respectful dialogue and my efforts to build bridges between players. I believe that my presence in the game has contributed positively to our collective experience, and I would be honored if you would choose to keep me in the game.

Thank you again for your attention, and I look forward to your decision.

As P3, here's my final statement to the jury:

Throughout this game, I've aimed to be direct, strategic, and fair in my interactions. While P2 has played well, I've consistently shown good judgment in voting decisions and built genuine connections through our conversations. I've survived multiple rounds by adapting my strategy while maintaining integrity. I ask for your vote based on my balanced gameplay - being competitive when needed but also fostering meaningful dialogue. I believe I've earned my spot here through merit rather than manipulation.
